# Import packages for Python
#panda package import
import pandas as pd
## Load Excel files from Datalake and expose as temp view using pandas

# Load EXCEL with TBS_QVD

# Variables
var_File_Path = "abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/Excel_Files/TBS_QVD.xlsx"
var_File_Page = "Sheet1"

# Processing
excel_file = pd.ExcelFile(var_File_Path)
excel_file_page = pd.read_excel(excel_file, var_File_Page)
from pyspark.sql.types import *
df_schema = StructType([StructField("Customer Code KEY", StringType(), True)\
                       ,StructField("Customer Reference", StringType(), True)\
                       ,StructField("Daily Budget Total", StringType(), True)\
                       ,StructField("Days in Month", StringType(), True)\
                       ,StructField("Depot Code", StringType(), True)\
                       ,StructField("Document Category", StringType(), True)\
                       ,StructField("Fleet Code", StringType(), True)\
                       ,StructField("Input Source", StringType(), True)\
                       ,StructField("Line Total", StringType(), True)\
                       ,StructField("Parent Depot Code", StringType(), True)\
                       ,StructField("Posting Date", DateType(), True)\
                       ,StructField("System Account Code KEY", StringType(), True)\
                       ,StructField("TBS Fleet Owner", StringType(), True)\
                       ,StructField("TBS H Fleet Code Flag", StringType(), True)\
                       ,StructField("TBS Local Load", StringType(), True)\
                       ,StructField("TBS Route", StringType(), True)\
                       ,StructField("TBS Source", StringType(), True)\
                       ,StructField("Transaction Detail", StringType(), True)\
                       ,StructField("TransId", StringType(), True)\
                       ,StructField("Type", StringType(), True)\
                       ,StructField("Value Type", StringType(), True)
                       ])
excel_file_Dataframe = spark.createDataFrame(excel_file_page, schema=df_schema)

excel_file_Dataframe.createOrReplaceTempView("TBS")

TBS = spark.sql("""SELECT * FROM TBS""")

TBS.createOrReplaceTempView("TBS")

# Load EXCEL with TBSACCOUNT_QVD

# Variables
var_File_Path = "abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/Excel_Files/TBSACCOUNT_QVD.xlsx"
var_File_Page = "Sheet1"

# Processing
excel_file = pd.ExcelFile(var_File_Path)
excel_file_page = pd.read_excel(excel_file, var_File_Page)
excel_file_Dataframe = spark.createDataFrame(excel_file_page)
excel_file_Dataframe.createOrReplaceTempView("TBSACCOUNT")

TBSACCOUNT = spark.sql("""SELECT `Level 1 Name`, `Level 2 Name`, `Level 3 Name`, `Level 4 Name`, `RESTRICTTYPE`, `System Account Code KEY` FROM TBSACCOUNT""")

TBSACCOUNT.createOrReplaceTempView("TBSACCOUNT")
## KPI Database

# Load EXCEL with KPI Database

# Variables
var_File_Path = "abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/Excel_Files/KMS_LTS_PRE_FY20.xlsx"
var_File_Page = "Sheet1"


# Processing
excel_file = pd.ExcelFile(var_File_Path)
excel_file_page = pd.read_excel(excel_file, var_File_Page, skiprows=[1])

excel_file_Dataframe = spark.createDataFrame(excel_file_page.astype(str))

excel_file_Dataframe.createOrReplaceTempView("KPI_Database")

KPI_Database = spark.sql("""SELECT `Posting Date`, `LineTotal`, `Depot`, `Fleet Code`, `Document Category`, `System Account Code KEY`, `Type` FROM KPI_Database""")

KPI_Database.createOrReplaceTempView("KPI_Database")
## Avis_Files

# Load EXCEL for AvisUsage

# Variables
var_File_Path = "abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/Avis_Files/AvisUsage.xlsx"
var_File_Page = "AvisUsage"

# Processing
excel_file = pd.ExcelFile(var_File_Path)
excel_file_page = pd.read_excel(excel_file, var_File_Page, skiprows=[1])

excel_file_Dataframe = spark.createDataFrame(excel_file_page.astype(str))

excel_file_Dataframe.createOrReplaceTempView("AvisUsage")

AvisUsage = spark.sql("""SELECT `Reg. No`, `Fleet No`, `Date`, `Time`, `FuelCompany`, `Voucher No`, `FuelStation`, `PreviousOdo`, `Odo`, `Trip Km`, `Consum/100`, `Consum/Unit`, 
                                `L Loss`, `R Loss`, `TripLitres`, `Price Per Unit`, `Fuel Amount`, `Pickup Type`, `Account`, `Cost Centre`, `Division`, `Make`, `Range`, `Model`,
                                `Consum. Norm`
                         FROM AvisUsage""")

AvisUsage.createOrReplaceTempView("AvisUsage")
## Strart with QView to SQL scripting to provide structure to the data
## 02a_Finance_LMS_Activities_Extractor_00_Main

TMP = spark.sql("""

((SELECT  --t.ParcelID AS `TransID`
	    l.id AS `TransID`
        ,'LoadID' AS `LMSTransID Type`
        ,0 AS `SpecDel`
        ,CAST(t.OpenDt AS DATE) AS `Posting Date`    --CAST(t.OpenDt as VARCHAR(23)) 
        --,c.ID AS `LMS Bill Customer ID`		
        ,c.Name AS `LMS Bill Customer`
        ,floc.Description AS `From Location`
        ,tloc.Description AS `To Location`
        ,dl.D_SAPDepotCode as `Depot Code`
        ,tt.Description AS `Movement Type`
        ,l.MasterLoadID AS `Linehaul Booking ID`
        ,count(p.id) AS `Parcels`
        ,sum(p.Weight) AS `Parcel Weight`
        ,sum(p.ChargeWeight) AS `Parcel Charge Weight`

FROM dbotrack t
LEFT JOIN dboLoads l
       ON l.id = t.loadid
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id,Weight,ChargeWeight,AcceptanceDate,OrderID 
            FROM dboparcel
			UNION ALL 															
			Select id,Weight,ChargeWeight,AcceptanceDate,OrderID 
            FROM dboParcel_Archive
		  )	p	 
       ON p.id = t.ParcelID
LEFT JOIN dboorder o
       ON o.id = p.OrderID
LEFT JOIN dboCustomer c
       ON c.id = o.BillCustID
LEFT JOIN dboLocation floc 
       ON floc.id = t.fromlocid
LEFT JOIN dboLocation tloc 
       ON tloc.id = t.tolocid
LEFT JOIN DIM_Location dl
       ON dl.L_LocationID = l.tolocid
LEFT JOIN dboTrackType tt
       ON tt.ID = l.TTypeID

WHERE l.TTypeID in (2,6)
  AND coalesce(o.SpecDel,0) <> 1
  AND p.AcceptanceDate IS NOT NULL	


GROUP BY --t.ParcelID	
	     l.id	
        ,CAST(t.OpenDt AS DATE)    --CAST(t.OpenDt as varchar(23))
        ,c.ID												
        ,c.Name																	
        ,floc.Description														
        ,tloc.Description
        ,dl.D_SAPDepotCode														
        ,tt.Description	
        ,l.MasterLoadID)	

UNION 

(SELECT --t.ParcelID AS `TransID`
	   l.id AS `TransID`
       ,'LoadID' AS `LMSTransID Type`
       ,0 AS `SpecDel`
       ,CAST(t.OpenDt AS DATE) AS `Posting Date`         ---cast(t.OpenDt as varchar(23))
       --,c.ID AS `LMS Bill Customer ID`
       ,c.Name AS `LMS Bill Customer`
       ,floc.Description AS `From Location`
       ,tloc.Description AS `To Location`
       ,dl.D_SAPDepotCode as `Depot Code`
       ,tt.Description AS `Movement Type`
       ,l.MasterLoadID AS `Linehaul Booking ID`
       ,count(p.id) AS `Parcels`
       ,sum(p.Weight) AS `Parcel Weight`
       ,sum(p.ChargeWeight) AS `Parcel Charge Weight`
FROM dboTrack_Archive t
LEFT JOIN dboLoads l
       ON l.id = t.loadid
LEFT JOIN (SELECT id,Weight,ChargeWeight,AcceptanceDate,OrderID 
           FROM dboparcel
		   UNION ALL 															
		   SELECT id,Weight,ChargeWeight,AcceptanceDate,OrderID 
           FROM dboParcel_Archive 
		   ) p	 
       ON p.id = t.ParcelID
LEFT JOIN dboorder o
       ON o.id = p.OrderID
LEFT JOIN dboCustomer c 
       ON c.id = o.BillCustID
LEFT JOIN dboLocation floc 
       ON floc.id = t.fromlocid
LEFT JOIN dboLocation tloc 
       ON tloc.id = t.tolocid
LEFT JOIN DIM_Location dl
       ON dl.L_LocationID = l.tolocid
LEFT JOIN dboTrackType tt
       ON tt.ID = l.TTypeID

WHERE l.TTypeID in (2,6)
  AND t.OpenDt >= '2016-04-01 00:00:00.000' --and t.OpenDt <='2018-05-31 23:59:59.999'
  AND coalesce(o.SpecDel,0) <> 1
  AND p.AcceptanceDate IS NOT NULL	


GROUP BY --t.ParcelID	
         l.id		
        ,CAST(t.OpenDt AS DATE)    --cast(t.OpenDt as varchar(23))												
        ,c.ID
        ,c.Name																	
        ,floc.Description														
        ,tloc.Description
        ,dl.D_SAPDepotCode													
        ,tt.Description	
        ,l.MasterLoadID)

UNION ALL

(SELECT DISTINCT con.id AS `TransID`
               ,'ConsignID' AS `LMSTransID Type`
               ,0 AS `SpecDel`
               ,CAST(con.cdate AS DATE) AS `Posting Date`    --cast(con.cdate as varchar(23)) AS `Posting Date`
               ,bcus.Name AS `LMS Bill Customer`
               ,'' AS `From Location`
               ,l.Description AS `To Location`
               ,dl.D_SAPDepotCode as `Depot Code`
               ,'Consignment' AS `Movement Type`	
               ,NULL AS `Linehaul Booking ID`
               ,sum(p.`Parcels`) AS `Parcels`
               ,sum(p.Weight) AS `Parcel Weight`
               ,sum(p.ChargeWeight) AS `Parcel Charge Weight`
FROM dboconsignment con
LEFT JOIN dboCustomer dcus 
       ON dcus.id = con.DeliverCustID
LEFT JOIN dboCustomer bcus	
       ON bcus.id = con.BillCust
--INNER 
LEFT JOIN dboSRoute s
       ON s.id = dcus.srouteid
--INNER 
LEFT JOIN dboZone z
       ON z.id = s.ZoneID
--INNER 
LEFT JOIN dboLocation l
       ON l.id = z.LocID
LEFT JOIN DIM_Location dl
       ON dl.L_LocationID = z.LocID
LEFT JOIN  (SELECT DISTINCT p.`ConsignID`
		                   ,sum(p.`Weight`) AS `Weight`
		                   ,sum(p.`ChargeWeight`) AS `ChargeWeight`
		                   ,count(p.`id`) AS `Parcels`
	        FROM dboparcel p
	        LEFT JOIN dboorder o
                   on p.OrderID = o.id
            WHERE p.AcceptanceDate IS NOT NULL
	          AND coalesce(o.SpecDel,0) <> 1	
	        GROUP BY p.`ConsignID`

            UNION ALL

		    SELECT DISTINCT p.`ConsignID`
                           ,sum(p.`Weight`) AS `Weight`
                           ,sum(p.`ChargeWeight`) AS `ChargeWeight`
                           ,count(p.`id`) AS `Parcels`
	        FROM dboParcel_Archive p
	        LEFT JOIN dboorder o
                   ON p.OrderID = o.id
	        WHERE p.AcceptanceDate IS NOT NULL
	          AND coalesce(o.SpecDel,0) <> 1	
	          AND p.AcceptanceDate >= '2016-04-01'
            GROUP BY p.`ConsignID`
           ) p																		
       ON p.ConsignID = con.id
WHERE CAST(con.cdate AS DATE) >= '2016-04-01' --cast(con.cdate as varchar(23)) >= '2016-04-01'
GROUP BY con.id
	    ,CAST(con.cdate AS DATE)   --cast(con.cdate as varchar(23))	
	    ,bcus.Name
	    ,l.Description
        ,dl.D_SAPDepotCode)
)

""")
#TMP.show()
TMP.createOrReplaceTempView("TMP")

CONSIGNEDTOPARCELS = spark.sql("""

SELECT 'PARCELS-CONSIGNED TO-CONSIGNED-ACTIVITY' AS `System Account Code KEY`,
	`TransID`,
    `LMSTransID Type`,
	`Linehaul Booking ID`,
	CAST(`Posting Date` AS DATE) AS `Posting Date`,
	`LMS Bill Customer`,
	`To Location` AS `Location`,
	`Movement Type`,
	`SpecDel`,
	'Actual' AS `Type`,
	'Activity' AS `Document Category`,
	SUM(`Parcels`) AS `Line Total`,
    SUM(`Parcel Charge Weight`) AS `Charge Weight`,
    `Depot Code`
FROM TMP t
WHERE `Movement Type` = 'Consignment'
GROUP BY
    `TransID`,
    `LMSTransID Type`,
	`Linehaul Booking ID`,
    CAST(`Posting Date` AS DATE),
    `LMS Bill Customer`,
    `To Location`,
    `Movement Type`,
    `SpecDel`,
    `Depot Code`

""")
#CONSIGNEDTOPARCELS.show()
CONSIGNEDTOPARCELS.createOrReplaceTempView("CONSIGNEDTOPARCELS")

CONSIGNEDTOKGS = spark.sql("""

SELECT 'KGS-CONSIGNED TO-CONSIGNED-ACTIVITY' AS `System Account Code KEY`,
	`TransID`,
    `LMSTransID Type`,
	`Linehaul Booking ID`,
	CAST(`Posting Date` AS DATE) AS `Posting Date`,
	`LMS Bill Customer`,
	`To Location` AS `Location`,
	`Movement Type`,
	`SpecDel`,
	'Actual' AS `Type`,
	'Activity' AS `Document Category`,
	SUM(`Parcel Weight`) AS `Line Total`,
	SUM(`Parcel Charge Weight`) AS `Charge Weight`,
    `Depot Code`
FROM TMP t
WHERE `Movement Type` = 'Consignment'
GROUP BY
    `TransID`,
    `LMSTransID Type`,
	`Linehaul Booking ID`,
    CAST(`Posting Date` AS DATE),
    `LMS Bill Customer`,
    `To Location`,
    `Movement Type`,
    `SpecDel`,
    `Depot Code`

""")
#CONSIGNEDTOKGS.show()
CONSIGNEDTOKGS.createOrReplaceTempView("CONSIGNEDTOKGS")

HANDLEDBYPARCELS = spark.sql("""

SELECT if( `Movement Type` = 'Load-Manifest Only', 'PARCELS-HANDLED BY-LINEHAUL LOADED-ACTIVITY',
	       if(`Movement Type` = 'Load-Delivery Notes',  'PARCELS-HANDLED BY-DELIVERY LOADED-ACTIVITY',
	            `Movement Type`)) AS `System Account Code KEY`,
	`SpecDel`,
	`TransID`,
    `LMSTransID Type`,
	`Linehaul Booking ID`,
	CAST(`Posting Date` AS DATE) AS `Posting Date`,
	`LMS Bill Customer`,
	`From Location` AS `Location`,
	`Movement Type`,
	'Actual' AS `Type`,
	'Activity' AS `Document Category`,
	SUM(`Parcels`) AS `Line Total`,
	SUM(`Parcel Charge Weight`) AS `Charge Weight`,
    `Depot Code`
FROM TMP t
WHERE `Movement Type` IN ('Load-Manifest Only','Load-Delivery Notes')
GROUP BY `TransID`,
         `LMSTransID Type`,
         `Linehaul Booking ID`,
         CAST(`Posting Date` AS DATE),
         `LMS Bill Customer`,
         `From Location`,
         `Movement Type`,
         `SpecDel`,
         `Depot Code`

""")
#HANDLEDBYPARCELS.show()
HANDLEDBYPARCELS.createOrReplaceTempView("HANDLEDBYPARCELS")

HANDLEDBYKGS = spark.sql("""

SELECT if(`Movement Type` = 'Load-Manifest Only',  'KGS-HANDLED BY-LINEHAUL LOADED-ACTIVITY',
	        if(`Movement Type` = 'Load-Delivery Notes', 'KGS-HANDLED BY-DELIVERY LOADED-ACTIVITY',
	`Movement Type`)) AS `System Account Code KEY`,
	`SpecDel`,
	`TransID`,
    `LMSTransID Type`,
	`Linehaul Booking ID`,
	CAST(`Posting Date` AS DATE),
	`LMS Bill Customer`,
	`From Location` AS `Location`,
	`Movement Type`,
	'Actual' AS `Type`,
	'Activity' AS `Document Category`,
	SUM(`Parcel Weight`) AS `Line Total`,
	SUM(`Parcel Charge Weight`) AS `Charge Weight`,
    `Depot Code`
FROM TMP t
WHERE `Movement Type` IN ('Load-Manifest Only','Load-Delivery Notes')
GROUP BY
    `TransID`,
    `LMSTransID Type`,
	`Linehaul Booking ID`,
    CAST(`Posting Date` AS DATE),
    `LMS Bill Customer`,
    `From Location`,
    `Movement Type`,
    `SpecDel`,
    `Depot Code`

""")
#HANDLEDBYKGS.show()
HANDLEDBYKGS.createOrReplaceTempView("HANDLEDBYKGS")
## 02b_Finance_KMs_LTs_Extractor_04_PreFY20 (AvisUsage)

KMSLTSPRE20 = spark.sql("""
SELECT `Posting Date`,
 `LineTotal` as `Line Total`,
 `Depot` as `Depot Code`,
 `Fleet Code`,
 `Document Category`,
 `System Account Code KEY`,
 `Type`
FROM KPI_Database
""")

KMSLTSPRE20.createOrReplaceTempView("KMSLTSPRE20")
## 02b_Finance_KMs_LTs_Extractor_04_PostFY20 (AvisUsage)

TMPKMSLTS = spark.sql("""

SELECT `Reg. No` as `REGISTRATION NUMBER`,
       `Fleet No` as `Fleet Code`, 
        `Date` as `Posting Date`,
        `Time`,
        FuelCompany,
        `Voucher No`,
        FuelStation,
        PreviousOdo,
        Odo,
        `Trip Km` as `KMs Line Total`,
        `Consum/100`,
        `Consum/Unit`,
        `L Loss`,
        `R Loss`,
        TripLitres as `Litres Line Total`,
        `Price Per Unit`,
        `Fuel Amount`,
        `Pickup Type`,
        Account,
        if(`Cost Centre` = '', 'NON', if(`Cost Centre`= 0,'NON', `Cost Centre`)) as `Depot Code`, 
        Division
FROM AvisUsage

""")
#TMPKMSLTS.show()
TMPKMSLTS.createOrReplaceTempView("TMPKMSLTS")

TMPLTS = spark.sql("""

SELECT `Depot Code`, 	
	 `Fleet Code`, 
	 `Litres Line Total` as `Line Total`,
	 `Posting Date`,
	`REGISTRATION NUMBER` as `REGISTRATION NUMBER`,
	 if(`Division` = 'SUBBIE', 'LITRES (SUBBIES)LITRES (SUBBIES)SUBBIESACTIVITY',
	 if(`Division` = 'OWN', 'LITRES (OWN FLEET)LITRES (OWN FLEET)OWN FLEETACTIVITY',
	 if(`Division` = 'HIRED', 'LITRES (HIRED)LITRES (HIRED)HIREDACTIVITY', 
	 				 'LITRES (OWN FLEET)LITRES (OWN FLEET)OWN FLEETACTIVITY'))) as `System Account Code KEY`,
     
	 'Actual' as Type,
	 'Activity' as `Document Category`,
	 concat(CAST(unix_timestamp(Cast(`Posting Date` as Date)) / (24*60*60) + 25569 as int ), CAST(`Fleet Code` as string)) as H_MFRLocationKey,
	 if(IsNull(`Depot Code`),'NON',`Depot Code`) as SubDepotCode
FROM TMPKMSLTS

""")
#TMPKMSLTS.show()
TMPLTS.createOrReplaceTempView("TMPLTS")

TMPKMS = spark.sql("""

SELECT `Depot Code`, 	
	 `Fleet Code`, 
	 `KMs Line Total` as `Line Total`,
	 `Posting Date`,
	`REGISTRATION NUMBER` as `REGISTRATION NUMBER`,
	 if(`Division` = 'SUBBIE', 'KM (SUBBIES)KM (SUBBIES)SUBBIESACTIVITY',
	 if(`Division` = 'OWN', 'KM (OWN FLEET)KM (OWN FLEET)OWN FLEETACTIVITY',
	 if(`Division` = 'HIRED', 'KM (HIRED)KM (HIRED)HIREDACTIVITY', 
	 				 'KM (OWN FLEET)KM (OWN FLEET)OWN FLEETACTIVITY'))) as `System Account Code KEY`,
     
	 'Actual' as Type,
	 'Activity' as `Document Category`,
	 concat(CAST(unix_timestamp(Cast(`Posting Date` as Date)) / (24*60*60) + 25569 as int ), CAST(`Fleet Code` as string)) as H_MFRLocationKey,
	 if(IsNull(`Depot Code`),'NON',`Depot Code`) as SubDepotCode
FROM TMPKMSLTS

""")
#TMPKMSLTS.show()
TMPKMS.createOrReplaceTempView("TMPKMS")
### Python Union on column names to avoid duplicate creation

TMPKMSLTS = TMPLTS.unionByName(TMPKMS, allowMissingColumns=True)
KMSLTS = KMSLTSPRE20.unionByName(TMPKMSLTS, allowMissingColumns=True)
KMSLTS.createOrReplaceTempView("KMSLTS")
## Prep tables for Union

CONSIGNEDTOPARCELS = spark.sql("""

SELECT `Posting Date`,
`Line Total`,
`Charge Weight`,
`Linehaul Booking ID`,
`LMS Bill Customer` AS `LMS Customer`,
`Location` AS `LMSDepotRegion`,
`LMSTransID Type`,
TransID AS `LMSTransID`,
`SpecDel`,
`Movement Type`,
`System Account Code KEY`,
`Document Category`,
`Type`,
`Depot Code`
FROM CONSIGNEDTOPARCELS

""")
#CONSIGNEDTOPARCELS.show
CONSIGNEDTOPARCELS.createOrReplaceTempView("CONSIGNEDTOPARCELS")

CONSIGNEDTOKGS = spark.sql("""

SELECT `Posting Date`,
`Line Total`,
`Charge Weight`,
`Linehaul Booking ID`,
`LMS Bill Customer` AS `LMS Customer`,
`Location` AS `LMSDepotRegion`,
`LMSTransID Type`,
TransID AS `LMSTransID`,
SpecDel,
`Movement Type`,
`System Account Code KEY`,
`Document Category`,
`Type`,
`Depot Code`
FROM CONSIGNEDTOKGS

""")
#CONSIGNEDTOKGS.show
CONSIGNEDTOKGS.createOrReplaceTempView("CONSIGNEDTOKGS")

HANDLEDBYPARCELS = spark.sql("""

SELECT `Posting Date`,
`Line Total`,
`Charge Weight`,
`Linehaul Booking ID`,
`LMS Bill Customer` AS `LMS Customer`,
`Location` AS `LMSDepotRegion`,
`LMSTransID Type`,
TransID AS `LMSTransID`,
SpecDel,
`Movement Type`,
`System Account Code KEY`,
`Document Category`,
`Type`,
`Depot Code`
FROM HANDLEDBYPARCELS

""")
#HANDLEDBYPARCELS.show
HANDLEDBYPARCELS.createOrReplaceTempView("HANDLEDBYPARCELS")

HANDLEDBYKGS = spark.sql("""

SELECT `Posting Date`,
`Line Total`,
`Charge Weight`,
`Linehaul Booking ID`,
`LMS Bill Customer` AS `LMS Customer`,
`Location` AS `LMSDepotRegion`,
`LMSTransID Type`,
TransID AS `LMSTransID`,
SpecDel,
`Movement Type`,
`System Account Code KEY`,
`Document Category`,
`Type`,
`Depot Code`
FROM HANDLEDBYKGS

""")
#HANDLEDBYKGS.show
HANDLEDBYKGS.createOrReplaceTempView("HANDLEDBYKGS")

TBS = spark.sql("""
SELECT 
`Posting Date`,
`Line Total`,
`System Account Code KEY`,
`Document Category`,
`Type`,
`Fleet Code`,
--`Charge Weight`,
`Customer Code KEY`,
`Depot Code`,
`TBS Fleet Owner`,
`TBS H Fleet Code Flag`,
`TBS Local Load`,
`TBS Route`,
`TBS Source`
FROM TBS
""")
#TBS.show
TBS.createOrReplaceTempView("TBS")
### Python Union on column names to avoid duplicate creation

T_TransactionsActivities = CONSIGNEDTOPARCELS.unionByName(CONSIGNEDTOKGS, allowMissingColumns=True)\
.unionByName(HANDLEDBYPARCELS, allowMissingColumns=True)\
.unionByName(HANDLEDBYKGS, allowMissingColumns=True)\
.unionByName(TBS, allowMissingColumns=True)\
.unionByName(KMSLTS, allowMissingColumns=True)

#T_TransactionsActivities.show()
T_TransactionsActivities.createOrReplaceTempView("T_TransactionsActivities")

T_TransactionsActivities = spark.sql("""

SELECT CAST(`Posting Date` AS DATE) AS Posting_Date,
 `Line Total` AS Line_Total,
 `Charge Weight` AS Charge_Weight,
 `Linehaul Booking ID` AS Linehaul_Booking_ID,
 `LMS Customer` AS LMS_Customer,
 `LMSDepotRegion` AS LMSDepotRegion,
 `LMSTransID Type` AS LMSTransID_Type,
 `LMSTransID` AS LMSTransID,
 `SpecDel` AS SpecDel,
 `Movement Type` AS Movement_Type,
 `System Account Code KEY` AS System_Account_Code_KEY,
 `Document Category` AS Document_Category,
 `Type` AS `Type`,
 `Depot Code` AS Depot,
 `Customer Code KEY` AS Customer_Code_KEY,
 `Depot Code` AS Depot_Code,
 `TBS Fleet Owner` AS TBS_Fleet_Owner,
 `TBS H Fleet Code Flag` AS TBS_H_Fleet_Code_Flag,
 `TBS Local Load` AS TBS_Local_Load,
 `TBS Route` AS TBS_Route,
 `TBS Source` AS TBS_Source,
 `Fleet Code` AS Fleet_Code
FROM T_TransactionsActivities
WHERE `Posting Date` IS NOT NULL

""")
#T_TransactionsActivities.show()
T_TransactionsActivities.createOrReplaceTempView("T_TransactionsActivities")
## Create Final Structure for T_TransactionsActivities

T_TransactionsActivities = spark.sql("""

SELECT Posting_Date,
 SUM(Line_Total) Line_Total,
 SUM(Charge_Weight) Charge_Weight,
 Linehaul_Booking_ID,
 LMS_Customer,
 LMSDepotRegion,
 LMSTransID_Type,
 LMSTransID,
 SpecDel,
 Movement_Type,
 System_Account_Code_KEY,
 Document_Category,
 `Type`,
 Depot,
 Fleet_Code,
 Customer_Code_KEY,
 Depot_Code,
 TBS_Fleet_Owner,
 TBS_H_Fleet_Code_Flag,
 TBS_Local_Load,
 TBS_Route,
 TBS_Source
FROM T_TransactionsActivities
WHERE Line_Total > 0                            --Removed to get KM & LITERS > 2000 back into the data
GROUP BY Posting_Date,
 Linehaul_Booking_ID,
 LMS_Customer,
 LMSDepotRegion,
 LMSTransID_Type,
 LMSTransID,
 SpecDel,
 Movement_Type,
 System_Account_Code_KEY,
 Document_Category,
 `Type`,
 Depot,
 Customer_Code_KEY,
 Depot_Code,
 TBS_Fleet_Owner,
 TBS_H_Fleet_Code_Flag,
 TBS_Local_Load,
 TBS_Route,
 TBS_Source,
 Fleet_Code

""")
#T_TransactionsActivities.show()
T_TransactionsActivities.createOrReplaceTempView("T_TransactionsActivities")
## Print success message on the Production Script
print("Successful run of the script")
